messages.message: Hey team, could someone help me get all services in a running state? Right now, for my sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/sayanbhattacharjee1?cw=dev), I see server-nginx and control-pane are both red in either Probes or Processes. For server-nginx it seems the error relates to using an old version of node (12.3, when we need >= 14?). However, i'm not sure how i can fix it commands online weren't very helpful (tried the command in the :thread:)

```owner@dev:~/instabase/webserver/shared/node$ npm audit fix --force
npm WARN using --force Recommended protections disabled.
npm WARN audit Updating @node-minify/core to 9.0.2,which is a SemVer major change.

added 37 packages, removed 8 packages, changed 5 packages, and audited 49 packages in 3s

15 packages are looking for funding
  run `npm fund` for details

found 0 vulnerabilities```

fwiw, I resynced the sandbox since I was seeing that `aihub_projects.old_splitter_instruction` was not found in the table so I assumed that the database needed to be updated. However, restarting mysql didn't do that for me
